properties.description: Rosehill are working in partnership with Copeland Borough Council, the Copeland Wellness Team and Groundworks to deliver free, weekly Warm Wellness Hubs in Whitehaven United Reform ChurchThe Warm Wellness Hubs will be a place for residents to come and keep warm and receive a warm meal and refreshments.In the afternoon we will have a creative session where residents can enjoy arts/photography/song writing/potteryWe will be inviting organisations along to deliver information and advice sessions in the morning.
